function.name: mode_getValue
function.description: This function is used to retrieve the current mode or course setting of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the SmartThings device is located.

room.description: The room where the SmartThings device is located.

device.description: The name of the SmartThings device that needs to retrieve the current mode or course.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the SmartThings device that needs to retrieve the current mode or course.
